comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of small crates
- \( y \): number of large crates

Constraints:
- \( x \geq 3y \): at least 3 times as many small crates as large crates must be used
- \( x \leq 100 \): at most 100 small crates available
- \( y \leq 50 \): at most 50 large crates available
- \( x + y \leq 60 \): total number of crates must be at most 60
- \( y \geq 10 \): at least 10 large crates must be used

Objective:
Maximize \( 200x + 500y \): total number of grapes transported
